current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Providing for congressional disapproval
		  under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the
		  Office of Family Assistance of the Administration for Children and Families of
		  the Department of Health and Human Services relating to waiver and expenditure
		  authority under section 1115 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1315) with
		  respect to the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families
		  program.
